titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the look-back method shall not apply to construction contracts required to use the percentage of completion method.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/24/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prescribe that the look-back method shall not apply to any construction contract and to any other contract required to use the percentage of completion method.
